office: U.S.-China Economic and Security Review Commission
key_responsibilities: monitoring developments in economics and trade pertaining to China, Taiwan, and the Asia-Pacific region
writing research papers and portions of the Commission’s Annual Report to Congress
requirements: Further responsibilities, qualification requirements, and information on how to apply can be found here

key_responsibilities: drafting press releases, speeches, op-eds, and letters to the editor
managing relationships with local and national reporters
curating an active social media presence
requirements: Superb written and verbal communication skills; comfortable multi-tasking; excellent attention to detail; work well under pressure; available nights and weekends as required

key_responsibilities: performing other administrative, legislative, and communications tasks as required
requirements: Understanding and adherence to the servant-leader model; high degree of professionalism; strong writing, organizational, and interpersonal skills; ability to take initiative in a dynamic, fast-paced environment; positive, collegial attitude

key_responsibilities: meet with constituents concerning policy matters
requirements: Libertarian or classical liberal; strong commitment to individual liberty, economic freedom, the Rule of Law, and the Constitution; excellent writer and clear thinker; JD or equivalent; two years of relevant policy experience preferred

key_responsibilities: efficient and accurate management of all aspects of the member’s daily and long-term schedule
contributing to other miscellaneous projects as needed
helping constituents with their visits to Washington, DC
requirements: Personable, organized, flexible, and calm under pressure; excellent communication and time-management skills; sense of urgency and the ability to work independently with sound judgment and minimal direction; ability to work cooperatively and courteously with others; BA or equivalent; two years of experience in an administrative or scheduling role preferred
